1343.content:
You've done it. You've finally done it. You created a portal between realities. Now you can travel to any plane of existence you want. You could bring weapons of mass destruction to your world and challenge world powers. You can bring in magical cure-alls into your world and get rich off of selling them to the public. You can find gold and bring it here to sell and become rich. As of now, you're practically a god.

And you decide to use said portal to fulfill a small fetish.

You see, this whole project couldn't have started without a desire, a wish. Your wish was to visit the realm of Final Fantasy VII, to go and visit the lovely Yuffie Kisaragi, the great ninja of Wutai. Just something about her compelled you to observe her further...

...and tickle her senseless.

A tickle fetish was something you were not entirely proud of, but you loved seeing girls helpless as they were tickled relentlessly. Something about their despair, their laughter, made you want more. It made you feel good. At first, it was just small, a couple of stories and images first got you going, but then it began to escalate, asking for commissions of your own stories and images for your own personal enjoyment, until it was always the first thing you thought about when you woke up and the last thing that was on your mind before you fell asleep. And at the center of it all: Yuffie.

All this allowed you to focus on creating this inter-dimensional reality portal.

Now, standing in your basement-turned-laboratory, the portal in front of you glowing bright blue, sending particles flying around the room, you feel like your dreams are about to become a reality. Four years staring at a professor discuss theorems and equations has led up to this. You, a tickle fetishist, are about to meet the girl who's going to help you fulfill your twisted desires...whether she wants to or not.

The best part of this portal was that whatever reality you entered it would be independent of other realities. This means, if you access one dimensions using a video game, and change up the world a bit, the changes will only affect its corresponding disc, and not any other. So you don't run the risk of running into any trouble, like altering the storyline, or, worse, having someone else notice the changes and report you to the authorities. Who knows why that's bad, but one thing's for sure: you did not want anyone else interrupting your fun by playing the same game at the same time.

As of now, the portal has coordinates set in the woods near Wutai. You plan to go through the portal, enter the world of Gaia, venture into Wutai, and - somehow - find and apprehend Wutai so that you can have your fun. After that...well, you can work out the details later. Right now, first things first - getting through the portal.
1343.title: "Personal" universe

13432.content:
The portal starts to shine brighter. Particles begin emitting at a faster rate. Sparks of electricity begin crackling through the air as all of this is playing out in front of you.

This has never happened before. Throughout the testing process you've only ever sent things through the portal, not the other way around. You never really did test the latter half, mainly because you didn't have any willing test subjects available (this was only a private project, the funds coming from favors you pulled out of college acquaintances - with the added bonus of them keeping things quiet.) Then a thought occurred - what would have happened if you tried to go home after you've had your fun with Yuffie? Would you have been able to get back home? Would you be stuck in the realm of Final Fantasy VII forever? Not that it wouldn't have been bad - then again, there was always the possibility of running into the wrong people in that game, like monsters, SOLDIERs, or even Sephiroth - you drop the thought right then and there, and return your focus to the portal.

It's fluctuating now. Originally, it only took a triangular shape, but now it's distorting in shape and color. And by the looks of things, it's only going to get worse.

Instruments hooked up to the portal started overloading. You dash to the main control panel to try and find the problem. However, the screen keeps flashing several errors, programs, processes - until a giant "WARNING" plastered itself onto the screen, before shutting off. Of course, this did not stop the situation at hand. You could only look on as the portal glowed brighter, brighter...

The screeching from it all was deafening. By now, almost all of the equipment has shut down or overloaded. And still the portal remains functioning.

You could only shield your eyes and pray that it all doesn't blow up in your face.

...
...
...

...It's all quiet now. The light appears to have faded, but you're still seeing spots as you withdraw your arms. As your vision returns to you, you look around.

The laboratory was kinda wrecked. Machines were either whirring down or blown out completely. Fortunately, it was all salvageable. It would take some time to fix it all up, but at least it wasn't all gone.

The portal was gone. The gate that acted as its containment field was empty, showing only the other side of the room. The inside of the gate was charred, almost melted together. That would be a problem fixing up.

Overall you feel crushed. There goes all your hard work, now just a pile of molten metal and circuitry. It almost looked like a modern art piece. You'd call it "Crushed Dreams," as it was very applicable right now.

You're now back at the front of the portal. You tilt your head downward, further surveying the damage, that you almost miss the figure lying underneath the gate. You jump in surprise - just who is this person? Where did they come from? Were they responsible for the malfunction?

The most important question nagging your mind, however: Did they come through the portal?

Cautiously, you approach the figure. Their face was to the ground, so you couldn't readily recognize them; inspecting the bodily proportions, you deduct that the person is female, but the attire seemed familiar.

A green, sleeveless turtleneck jumper, revealing their torso, brown, fingerless gloves, tan shorts, and orange shoes covered the body. What appeared to be an arm guard was discarded and laid near her body, along with a giant shuriken. The strands from a headband laid across the back of her head.

It couldn't be.

You kneeled down to further inspect the body. There was no visible sign of injuries, but you still gingerly turned the body over.

Your eyes widened as you see Yuffie's sleeping face right before you.

Again, your head fills with thoughts. Is this real? Are you imagining things? No, you're touching her right now; you brush some hair off her face, you hear her breathing softly, see her chest rise and fall rhythmically. How did she end up being teleported here? Did she discover this on accident? Was it the coincidence? Did the RNG work in your favor and so the portal catch her at the right place in the right time? More and more questions flood your head, but one stood alone amongst them.

Well, what are you waiting for? She's here, right? What are you gonna do now?

What are you going to do?

A boy in a black cloak with a hood covering the top half of his head has been tailing Dawn for awhile. The young Pokemon Coordinator, Dawn, is annoyed by her stalker and challenges him to a 3 on 3 Pokemon battle. If Dawn wins this match, she wants this mysterious child to stop following her. However, what does the boy get out of this battle? There's no benefit for him, so the cloaked boy requests that if he wins the match, Dawn will permanently be his toy.

The young coordinator did not fully understood what he meant by "toy", and she rather not find out. She's confident that she can win against such a young boy with no problem. A town is nearby ahead for Dawn to compete in a Pokemon contest to win a ribbon. It would be nice to have a little match before the competing in the contest.The two Pokemon trainers face towards each other with the confidence to win. Dawn's partner, Piplup, is her first Pokemon, "Piplup! Spot Light!" The small blue penguin-like Pokemon chirps, "Piplup!" and stands in overconfidence just like his trainer.

The boy flung a Pokemon into the air swiftly as a Pokemon appears out of it, "Sableye!"

Dawn's eyes grew curious as she has never seen a Sableye before. She activates her Pokedex to gain info. The robotic voice sounds from her Pokedex, "Sableye, the Darkness Pokémon. Sableye normally live within caves and eat rocks. They use their sharp claws to dig through the earth."

Dawn is still confused, "But wait! Your Sableye is golden, not purple."

"My Sableye is a Shiny Pokemon; it's quite rare," informs the child. The boy attacks first, "Sableye, use Toxic!" The small golden ghost type Pokemon fires a stream of purple smog from its mouth and poisons Piplup in a heartbeat.

"Alright then, Piplup, use Bubblebeam!" The small blue penguin fires a barrage of bubble out of its beak. The attack makes direct contact at the Ghost Pokemon.

Summary of the rest of the battle: Piplup was hit by Foul Play and the rest of its health was depleted by poisoning. Sableye may have taken damage by Hydro Pump, but it constantly used Recover.

Dawn's next two Pokemon, Mamoswine and Togekiss, fell victim to the same battle pattern. Sableye kept on using Recover as Dawn's Pokemon gets hurt by Night Shade and faints by Toxic's deadly poisoning effect. The boy has won with a mere ghost Pokemon, as he has yet five more Ghost Pokemon unknown to Dawn.

"I-I lost...?" Dawn falls to her knees and feels deeply discouraged. She lost to a single Pokemon.

The boy walks towards her, "Don't forget the deal we made." He reminds Dawn of the little promise that they both made.

The girl's eye widens in fear. What will happen to her if she is a "toy" to this boy? "B-but wait! Please let me go to a Pokemon center to heal my Pokemon first! They're badly wounded."

"The moment you lost that battle," the boy explains, "Your's life belonged to me. You were overconfident, but even if you weren't, you probably still have lost."

The boy sends out another Ghost Pokemon that blocks Dawn from running, "Cofagrigus!" A coffin shaped Ghost Pokemon that's silver. It's another Shiny Pokemon. Dawn's Pokedex informs her, "Cofagrigus, the Coffin Pokémon and the evolved form of Yamask. People who approach Cofagrigus are swallowed and turned into mummies. It loves to eat gold."

Cofagrigus used Psychic to suspend Dawn in midair, leaving Dawn unable to move her body, "NO! PLEASE! DON'T EAT ME!" The coffin shaped Pokemon opens up like a door as Dawn was forcefully locked inside as the door shuts closed. She is trapped inside the Pokemon's body.

"Don't worry Dawn. Cofagrigus only eats gold, not humans. With no evidence left, no one can find you. Let's go, Cofagrigus,"

Inside the coffin Pokemon, Dawn's body is wrapped in white bandages that covers head to toe but leaves her nose and eyes exposed so she can breathe and see the darkness.

"Which would explain your job for me," replied Lana, trying not to show shock to this.

The head prosecutor chuckled. "Ah, you still are as sharp as ever. Just as the files say." He leafed through her profile lazily, not looking for anything whatsoever.'I am giving you a proposition, not a request."

"And that proposition would be...?" inquired Lana.

The head prosecutor put the folder down. He leaned back in his own chair, putting his hands in his coat pockets. "I want you to be my personal...form of entertainment. Rest assured, neither you or your sister will be harmed, however I do know some powerful people. Powerful enough to get both of in back in prison."

Lena gritted her teeth as he mentioned this.

"Now,being a tickle slave isn't all that bad. You will still be treated as a normal person outside this office, but inside, you are all mine.," the man said.

Lena couldn't believe this. Being a slave...just to be tickled? Rather strange, and wrong. However, she still fears for her sister's condition, as well as the position she is under.

The man smiled. "Well? What do you say?"
14513211.title: Proposition

145132111.content:
"Excellent choice, Miss Skye," replied the head prosecutor. "Now, for your the first order of business, I.d like you to remove you shoes please."

Sighing, Lana bent down to remove her shoes. As she did, the head prosecutor, bent down under his desk, pulling out some stocks. Unlike traditional stocks, these were for kneeling. There was a cushion on the top, made to sit upon. There was also a sort of ramp on the other end, underneath where the feet stick out, so the tops of the feet lie on the ramp, making the soles winkle themselves. All of these new parts can be removed to become traditional stocks. He also grabbed some rope, a bag, and some long pieces of cloth.

When Lana was done, the head prosecutor stood up, and walked over to the center of the room. Lana Skye, now barefoot, walked over to the head prosecutor, noting the items he was carrying. She herself was carrying her heels in one hand.

The prosecutor placed the special stocks on the floor. "Kneel down and sit on this cushion here," he commanded, pointing to the seat on the stocks. "While you do that, please stick your feet into these holes. Also, hold your arms upwards, toward the ceiling."

Lena looked at the stocks uncertainly. Her own feet were sensitive; before her imprisonment, her younger sister Ema used to playfully tickle Her in their house, and Ema always aimed for her feet. It's not to say Lana is only ticklish on her feet; her entire body was dangerously sensitive, but her feet...oh god, what she would do when they are teased!

The prosecutor, noticing Lena's hesitation, sighed."Don't worry, I'll only go lightly when we start."

Feeling a little relaxed, Lana eased herself on the contraption. The stocks were opened, allowing Lana to rest her ankles on the bottom of the holes. As soon as the stocks closed and locked, she sat on the cushion. Lana noticed how her soles wrinkled themselves as they eased onto the ramp on the other side, fearing about her predicament.

The prosecutor, meanwhile, stared at Lana's soles. They were pale, much like her body, and gave off a sort of glow to them as the light rested onto her feet. Her toes were not too long, but not too short, and looked rather pudgy. They wiggled slightly as the air conditioning swept through the room, and on her feet. No nail polish either, meaning she keeps them naturally wonderful. To the head prosecutor, this is perfect. He felt a slight bulge in his pants while staring at her feet, before coming to his senses.

"Right, let us continue," he coughed, before raising the rope. He approached Lana from behind, while she was raising her arms. He crossed her wrists before before tying them up together, then proceeded to tie them to the ceiling. In the middle of the room was a metal ring, secured with screws. Using a stepladder, the prosecutor threaded the rope through the ring and pulled the rope taut. Lana felt her arms stretch until she couldn't bring them down anymore. The head prosecutor thentied off the knot at the top, effectively restraining Lana's arms.

Back on the ground, the head prosecutor finishes up with a blindfold using one of the long cloths. Lena gasps at this, now that she lost her sense of sight. This also means no knowing what the prosecutor will do to her...

The head prosecutor bends down and whispers into her ear, "Comfortable, my dear?" This causes Lana to gasp in fright, which makes the head prosecutor smile. "Wait here, I'll be right back."

The head prosecutor walks over to his desk. In one of the drawers is a paging device. He pages his secretary. "Cancel all appointments. Tell those who want to visit me that I am busy at the moment. Also, keep others from entering my room. I'd like my privacy."

"Very well," said the woman on the other end. The head prosecutor smiled and ended the call.

Lana, though losing her sight, was able to hear the head prosecutor talk to someone. Judging by the faintness of the conversation, he was probably at his desk. When she heard his footsteps growing louder, she readied herself for what's to come.

The head prosecutor returned to Lana. Looking at his watch, he read 1:27 P.M. Afterwards, he turned to Lana. "Well, shall we get started?"
145132111.title: Now, for the fun...

1451321111.content:
The head prosecutor stares at Lana's milky soles for a while, before shaking his head. "I'll save the best for last, " he muttered, before redirecting his attention to Lana. He walked back to his desk and took one of the wooden chairs. Placing it in front of Lana, the head prosecutor took a seat. He reached out and, with one finger, he began to dig his finger into the right clothed armpit of Lana.

Lana stiffled a giggle, biting her lip as the head prosecutor continued to dig his finger into her armpit. The head prosecutor grinned at her reaction. "Well, someone's a little ticklish, isn't she?" he teased, causing Lana to blush and shake her head. She wasn't going to succumb to his touches. She can bear such tickling, but only just...

The head prosecutor stepped it up by using his other hand, tormenting Lana further. She was shaking now, as her face went a bright red to the signals her nerves were sending. Lana was losing her willpower. She wasn't going to give him the satisfaction just yet...

"Now now, it's okay to laugh," he cooed."This room is soundproof from the inside, meaning you can laugh your heart out, just for me." Lana turned a bit more red at the last part of that sentence. The head prosecutor took the chance to add in his middle fingers, making Lana gasp at two fingers on each pit. She began to crack.

"Pfffffhehehehehe...no...," she giggled, as he continued the process.

"Come now, I don't want much," the head prosecutor teased. "All I want is to hear that glorious laugh you're hiding." Seeing Lana shake her head, he added in his ring fingers, and sped up the tickling, making three fingers raking each of Lana's armpits. The clothes, though hiding the bare flesh, does not fully protect her sensitive armpits. Lana began shaking in her bonds as she broke into laughter.

"Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha nohohohohohohohohohohooooo pleehehehehehehehehhease stohohohohohohohohohohohohohohohoop!!!"

Her pleas fell on deaf ears, as the head prosecutor was too busy listening to her sweet laughter echo around the room. He stopped to give her a breather, and looked at Lana pant. She breathed heavily, trying to regain her breath. She was sweating a bit on her face, and she was a light red. She wasn't crying ,not yet.

After 3 minutes, the head prosecutor resumed, without warning. This time, he used both his entire hands, the left scribbling on her pit while the right raked up and down on her other pit. By now, she was laughing harder, and much more begging was heard.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAD MAHAHAHAHAHAHAKE IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIT STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP MAKE IT STHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

She was shaking even more, trying to move away from his hands, but there was nothing she could do. She leaned her head onto her left arm, still laughing a storm, as the head prosecutor worked on her armpits. Tears were leaking into the blindfold as this continued for 20 minutes.

She was to immersed into the tickling that she didn't notice that it had stopped. Gasping in lungfuls of air, she barely manage to hear the head prosecutor rustle through his bag. She was later met with her clothing being cut off. Before she could try to retaliate, her military jacket and gray undershirt were cut with a knife and removed from her body.

"Don't worry, I can pay for replacements," reassured the head prosecutor. Lana wasn't worried about clothing costs, however. She was now more vulnerable than ever, with only a dark brown bra to cover up what dignity she had. She shivered as the air conditioning blew around her, adding to the sense of vulnerability.

After returning the knife, the head prosecutor resumed his tickling , using the same technique as before. This time, without the scant protection of her clothing, her bare underarms received the full brunt of the attack. Lana howled as his fingers ran all over her sensitive armpits.

"OHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAD OHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO PLEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEASE MAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAKE ITHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIT STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP I BEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEG YOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOU IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHI CAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHANT TAHAHAHAHAHAKE ANYMOHOHOHOHOHOHOHORE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Lana was crying even harder now, as tears began to mix in with the sweat of her face. Her face was bright red, and she was shaking more now.Her head was shaking left and right, as if it might stop the ticklish onslaught the head prosecutor was giving. After 20 minutes, the head prosecutor draws his hands back, smirking as Lana hung there, breathing in as much air as possible. She let the rope restraining her arms keep her standing, as she tried to get her bearings straight.

The head prosecutor stood up, and walked to a corner in the room. There was a water dispenser there. He withdrew a cup and poured out cold water. He went back to his desk to retrieve a straw. He then went to Lana, who by this time is just about calming down, and, putting the straw in her mouth, placed the straw in the cup of water.Lana drained the cup rather quickly, looking a little refreshed than before.

The head prosecutor got up again, adn putting the cup to the side, and now sitting on the floor, said to Lana, "Shall we continue?"

"Yes, please," replied Lana, thankful to be given such a respite. While the man went to fetch her some water, she looked for a clock for the time. At the top of the exit was a wall clock. It read 2:55 P.M. I've been here for an hour, Lana deduced. How long will I be here?

As if reading her mind, the head prosecutor answered her question. "You'll be here until 9:00 P.M, then we go home. You'll be staying with me. Don't worry; I won't be doing anything bad to you. You are only my tickle slave, but I can't have you running away from me. Now, that would be rather troublesome, don't you agree?"

Lana blushed lightly, before realizing that the head prosecutor was bent down holding her water. She sipped through the straw before emptying the cup. The head prosecutor took the empty cup and placed it down again. He then examined her. She was back to normal, minus the slight breathing and redness of face.

"I think I'll work on..."

The head prosecutor watched quietly from a chair while Lana began to recover from fainting. Still restrained in the stocks with her arms suspended above her, her head had lolled to the side after fainting, but began to stir as she came to.

"Mmm...wha...?" Lana mumbled, not yet remembering her predicament. The head prosecutor now busied himself removing her bonds, first the stocks at her feet, then catching her exhausted body as he removed the rope from her wrists. Lana's eyes grew wide as she remembered what had just taken place, still feeling the sensation of incessant tickling all over her body from earlier. She grasped the head prosecutor's sleeve with her newly-freed hands--"Are we done now? It's over, right?"

"This atmosphere is a little too stifling. It'd be better to rest somewhere more comfortable, don't you think?" The head prosecutor said, placing his jacket around her shoulders. The tattered remains of her clothing would do nothing to cover her up now. Lana perked up at the mention of "rest", although he hadn't really answered her question. Before she could ask again, the head prosecutor was already calling for his car to be brought up immediately so he could leave the office. He then ushered Lana out of the room, through the HQ and to his car despite her protests over not being fully clothed. The only people who caught a glimpse of Lana's half-naked glory were the receptionist and valet, who respectfully kept their silence.

The car ride to the head prosecutor's home was quick, with him making normal conversation despite the strange circumstances. But Lana was uncomfortable all the while at the thought of being completely alone with him in his own domain. A public building seemed to afford her some protection, even if she was in a private office. But a home setting was completely different. Here, he would be completely uninhibited. When they finally reached the head prosecutor's house, he opened the door for her and waited for her to enter (half out of chivalry, and half to ensure she didn't try to bolt). "Welcome to my humble abode," he joked.

When she stepped inside his home, Lana was struck by the classy decor and tidiness. Who knew a single man living alone could be so neat? She began to relax, having expected a dungeon of inequity but seeing only a nice, normal house. The head prosecutor let her admire his home for a few moments before tapping her on the shoulder. "Take off that jacket and follow me," he instructed, and Lana remembered once more that she was, in fact, a tickle slave and had to obey. He led her to his bedroom and onto the bed, placing her in a reclining position against the pillows. He saw that she was tensed in anticipation for something horrible, so he began running his fingers soothingly over her arms. "Don't look so terrified. We're resting here, remember?" Lana still didn't trust him, but the gentle caressing after the brutal torture session earlier felt comforting, and she soon relaxed into his touch, sighing in contentment.

The head prosecutor ran his hands from her arms to her neck, massaging there and reaching around to her back. He slid them down her sides, touching lightly and skillfully so that Lana arched her back to seek more contact. He quickly withdrew his hands from there, moving down to Lana's smooth legs and giving them the same treatment. Lana rubbed her legs together impatiently, wanting something more but not quite sure what. What she didn't detect was that the head prosecutor was prepping her body to crave the sensation of being tickled. While before she drew back from his intense ministrations, now she couldn't be satisfied by such light teasing. She didn't realize how much her body was beginning to writhe and twitch in desire, but he sure did. The head prosecutor's desire grew as he moved his touch to her feet, which were flexing in the same cadence as the rest of her body. He was sure to make his touch especially light here, knowing how sensitive her soles were. He ran a finger up and down, barely touching at all, making Lana flex her toes to expose as much skin as possible, wanting to be further stimulated.

At this point, the head prosecutor felt she was ready. He lightly wiggled his finger under her big toe, scratching a little with his nail and Lana let out a cute giggle in response. The head prosecutor looked at her knowingly and began tickling down her foot, enjoying her laughter as she wriggled on the bed, currently unrestrained. "Beginning to get a taste for being tickled, are we?" He teased. Lana immediately blushed and denied it, but didn't withdraw her foot from his grasp. "Well if you're still so adverse to it, maybe I should tie you to the bed so you can't run away. All this moving around is making it difficult for me to play with you effectively."

145132111111121.content:
Despite the amount of effort the head prosecutor put in, Lana could not help but wriggle under his touch. He would only get in about five seconds of physical contact before she would shift her body away from his touch, all the while giggling up a storm.

Finally, the head prosecutor let out a breath. "It appears that you're still not as compliant as I wished you would be," he said. He got up from his seat on the bed, and walked over to the nightstand. Pulling open a drawer, he revealed some police handcuffs and rope. "Oh well, this makes it a little more fun," he said with a smirk. With cuffs in hand, he approached the head of the bed and began locking the cuffs to the headboard.

Recovering from her laughter stupor, Lana realized his intentions as she struggled to regain her composure. "N-No! I'll hold still! Don't worry! You don't have to - " the clicking of the handcuffs on her wrists cut her off. Once he was done, she pulled at her arms. She grimaced; while there was indeed some slack, the decrease in mobility made her worrisome. She returned her attention to the head prosecutor, who was moving to the foot of the bed, getting ready to lock her ankles to the other end of the bed. If he tickled her just like back in his office...

The head prosecutor was just locking one of the cuffs to the end of the board when he saw, from the corner of his eye, Lana pulling herself towards the head board and trying to sit in an upright position, in an effort to keep him from completely binding her. She bent her legs close to her body, prepared to lash out in retaliation if he so tried to lay a finger on her. As he turned his gaze towards her, a look of worry, anger, and defiance was clearly set upon her face. Once again, he let out an exasperated sigh.

"You do realize that, given your current situation, I could just call the offices and send you and your little sister back in prison," he said nonchalantly. Lana visibly hesitated as she remembered this fact. He held hers and her sister's lies in his hands of those. And he had the power to take it all away. The thought of her sister waking up in a cell...she shook her head.

The room fell silent. No sound dared to break the tense atmosphere as Lana weighed her options. Forfeit her body and her freedom to this man's sick fetish, or forfeit her sister's life for good. Neither option sounded appealing to her. The rational part of her said that it was a bad idea to defy him, but she did not want to go through such a rough tickle session for awhile. And yet, why did she react the way she did just earlier, when he was lightly tickling her? Lana recalled what he had said, how she appeared to acquire "a taste for being tickled." She lightly blushed as she tried to convince herself otherwise. She wasn't liking it; hat was because her body was still sensitive from all of the tickling she somehow endured. He's luring me into a false sense of security, she thought. Don't fall for it. But his touch felt comforting...

While she was pondering his words, the prosecutor monitored how Lana's body stopped being tense. As time passed, he noted how she lowered her guard ever so slowly, waiting for the time to strike, while ensuring she isn't harmed whatsoever with what he's planning to attempt. Eventually she lowered her legs enough for the head prosecutor to make a grab for them. "Wha-" she couldn't finish her exclamation. In one swift motion, he pulled her legs to the awaiting cuffs, and locked them into place. Now stretched out on his bed, it took Lana a moment to process what transpired, before glaring at her captor. "You..." but she didn't finish.

He flashed a smile before lowering his gaze to see more of her bound form. Surprisingly, Lana did not try to cover herself up, much less writhe in her bonds. "Where did all that resistance go?" he pondered. She had turned her head away, blushing at how he was eyeing her, and did not try to answer. He shrugged. "Being compliant now isn't going to make me take these off, you know. But I can assure you," he leaned closer to Lana, and their eyes met, "I'll not be any more rough as back in the office, for the time being. There will be more time for that in the future."

Hearing these words gave Lana a bit of relief. The head prosecutor seated himself to her side. "For now, let's take it slow. After all, this is still your first day as my tickle slave. Let's get you more comfortable, shall we?" he smiled. He leaned forward, arms outstretched, and began to gently caress her exposed midriff, eliciting beautiful giggles from her mouth. She squirmed in protest, but the newly added bonds restricted her from defending herself. She could only shake her head side to side as his fingers played with her skin. He skittered his hands and fingers up and down her sides, pinching every now and then, causing her to jump in the bed every time. Afterwards, he moved his hands towards her abdomen, poking and prodding her belly. Her giggles rose as he applied both at the same time at random intervals.However, true to his word, he did not go so far as to make her cry and struggle. There were short pauses when he switched regions, which gave her plenty of air to spare.

But this also had the unknown effect of Lana wanting more of his touch. Subtly, her body squirmed not away from his hands, but towards them, in an attempt to prolong the amount of contact she was experiencing. The head prosecutor took a mental note of this. So she exhibits this nature when restricted...very interesting indeed, he thought. And very beneficial. After about 10 minutes, he decided to introduce a new variable to the tickling. Amidst her giggles, Lana glanced down and barely caught the head prosecutor digging his hands into her exposed armpits, and let out a yelp upon contact. Her giggles escalated into laughter as he scratched away at those hollow spots. Her upper body began frantically struggling. The longing nature for his touch faded away, as she pulled at her bonds in an effort to lower her arms and cease the tickling.

The head prosecutor had realized that he overdid it, and slowed down considerably, returning to lightly stroking her armpits. As her laughter ceased, she panted for breath, her face bright red and grinning. Her gaze was now fixed to the ceiling as she tried to regain her composure amidst the light touches and tickles. She's still not letting go. Perhaps this is going to take much longer than I thought, he remarked in his head. While he continued to touch and prod her armpits, he reintroduced the sides and belly to the tickling, something which she expected but was not ready for. Once more she bucked against her restraints, and she flew into a fit of giggles, however this time it was less pronounced.

And so, for about another 10 minutes, the head prosecutor slowly tickled Lana's upper body, alternating between sides, belly, and armpits. The bedroom filled with her laughter. However, a new sound found its way in the room; the growling of stomachs from the two occupants. Upon hearing this, the head prosecutor stifled a laugh, before withdrawing himself from Lana. As he withdrew, Lana herself began to feel the pangs of hunger getting to her. She hadn't eaten fro awhile now, she realized. The last time I ate was before I arrived at his office, she remembered.

The prosecutor himself shared the same thought. The last thing that I put in my mouth was...he glanced down Lana's body to where her feet were cuffed, to which he smirked. He turned his attention back to Lana. "It seems we're both in need of some food," he remarked. "Let's call it a day after dinner, agreed?" choices: Ivy wins a battle by capturing somebody

1453222222211.content:
A new game of soles was announced, another race for Sole Edge, the mightiest feather-sword known and the finest tickle tool in all the lands, and a fierce battle among those who wished to control it.

Ivy Valentine was viewed as a hopeful contender by most. Herself a very domineering woman and no stranger to both submission and inflicting pain or pleasure herself, merciless in the pursuit of her opponents but not easy to break if bested either. Her high heeled metal boots and soft gloved fingers were feared by many, as well as her main weapon, a feather that could extend into a whip that could easily tie up her opponents. She replaced the small blades on her whip with soft feathers also, so a victim would be tickled just by the act of getting tied up. With these tools she had won many victories. Talim, the young hotshot of the Village of the Wind would get easily tied up and had her sandals removed, and her small feet teased until she cried out her loss. The sisters Sophitia and Cassandra were a though nut to crack, but were eventually defeated and forced to tickle each other to exhaustion to escape being kept forever as tickle-toys by Ivy. Yiaungha put up a fair fight, but was defeated fairly and then shamed when after being tied up her kneecaps turned out to be so ticklish they could turn her into a crying little girl. The ninja Taki managed to pull one over her that cost her half the match, but Ivy made a comeback in the second round, and the techniques she picked up from her were more than worth the long and humiliating torment she had to go through for them.
As for the others - well, Ivy did not have the chance to meet all of them yet, but was very much looking forward to seeing if Seaung Mina would still manage to hold onto her trust if she was tickled by a friend or tickle-tortured until forced to betray them, or if a proud strong man like Maxi could be turned into her obedient slave.

In other words, Ivy wasn't a woman who'd simply give up regardless of the amount of times she herself was on the receiving end. Yet even she met her match and was forced to drop out of the contest once...
1453222222211.title: Scenario 1: the tickle tournament!

14532222222112.content:
It happened one night after she discovered the hidden treasure cave of the freak Voldo. The prize, the stash of weapons and treasure must have caused her to let her guard down because she fell asleep in the cave, and when she woke up she found out that she was tied. Voldo's cave of course, among other things, had all sorts of bondage equipment, and it were these chains that she's been secured to Voldo's master's throne to, her arms pulled back and the cuffs around her wrists linked to a chain pulled connecting to the back of the throne, and her booted feet placed into metallic stocks.
What a boring set-up, whoever did this truly lacked creativity in the fine art of bondage.

"Humph. You call this a trap?" she said aloud.

"Who are you?! What are you doing?" she said when she saw a figure move among the columns. The person revealed himself, and turned out to be a familar character.

"IVY! versus...CERVANTES!" the announcer yelled, and Ivy was gazing at the hated silhouette of her estranged father.

He extended a hand towards her.
"Return to me, my child."

Ivy sweated a bit but smirked. So, he was still up to his old games. This pitiful old man.
"Heh. You don't change much, do you?"

"Offer your soul!"
"Silence! I can change my own destiny! You dare to challenge me? fool!"

Cervantes stepped forward, threateningly.

"Disappear, you disgusting creature of hell!" Ivy cried out her clear rejection.

"So... you dare to defy me?" Cervantes asked.

"Did you expect me to yield to the likes of you?"

"You shall regret... the day you encountered me." Cervantes said, stepping yet closer.

"Hmph. You better amuse me."

"Very well, then. Now...Offer your sole to me." Cervantes said, and slid her feet out of her metal boots. The tough steel boots came off with little difficulty, revealing a pair of well groomed shapely pair of feet. Ivy's feet were not the pudgy soft soles of Talim, nor the giant boney feet with baby soft soles like Kilik's. Rather, they were the strong but slender and elegant feet of a slim older woman, with a finely curved arch and instep and pronounced ankle, smooth and firm soles with cute visible folds, and pointy toes with nails painted in dark shades of purple and red.
Cervantes savored the view of his daughter's nice feet.
"Heh heh heh... I'm tingling with excitement."

He ran his index finger up and down on Ivy's right sole, causing Ivy to clench her teeth.

"What a waste of my time! Hurry up and die." Cervantes urged her. However, Ivy was much toucher than this; it was ridiculous that the old man thought that only this much could make her even just laugh.

"I shall enjoy feasting on your sole!" Cervantes said. He knelt down and ran a tongue all over the side of the side of her feet. "Your sole makes a poor meal!"

"You disgust me." Ivy said and turned her head away.

"It's useless! Take this!" he said and started running all ten of his fingers over his two feet. Ivy closed her eyes - harder this might be for her, it wasn't nearly enough to make her cry or beg, and he noticed at this point that the old man's technique was actually quite sloppy and his crude fingers unsuited for the task. Had it been Ivy's long nails sliding along her victim's sole, they'd have been in ticklish hell already, and she wouldn't have missed the opportunity to spider-tickle their weakest spots and gently caress the sides, heels and toes all at once to show them what true teasing and overwhelming ticklishness were all about.
This'd be a child's play; she'd only have to last until the battle timed out, and then the old man would have no choice but to leave.

"You dare to challenge me, you fool!" Cervantes said, seeing that her daughter had no intention of responding. "Have a good taste... of my power! Take this!"

Ivy suddenly felt something horrible on her feet and was forced to turn her head back to look. Her father was sliding the feather he wielded in the place of a sword all along her smooth soles.
This was Ivy's carefully guarded secret. You wouldn't have thought from looking at her or her feet, but she was very feather ticklish. It was her own experiences that drove her to creating the feather-whip in the first place. There was nothing more horrible she could imagine, nothing she feared more than one of these things.

Although she was trying her best not to give her opponent an opening, she couldn't bear it and not let out a giggle.

"Hm, hahaha, hm, hm, haaah!"

She tried to arch back in her seat and pull her feet back and to the sides as far as the bonds allowed, but it wasn't much and she knew she was only making a fool out of herself.

"You have nowhere to run. It's useless." her father announced.

"No...I won't allow this." she responded. "How could I lose to you?"

"What an annoying little girl you are. I'll make you regret ever awakening! It's time I send you into the deep!"

He pulled out something from his pocket, and held it up for her daughter to see.
"Cower in fear!"
It was...Oh no.
"This sword... ahaha." Ivy said nervously.
What was between his fingers, rocking back and forth in the wind, was none other than SOLE EDGE, the feather feared by all from one end of the world to the other. It was fabled to be so smooth, its caress could make your libido peak and your worries melt; yet so prickly that even just a small touch felt like a thousand tiny bristles running across your own skin. Its touch was the greatest bliss and yet the greatest source of fear and panic, and unbelievably tickly. It was said to make priests betray their gods, heroes and kings betray their countries, and lovers betray their most beloved; to deliver the highest peak of ecstasy as easily as the deepest depths of torment, and no-one that felt its touch ever remained the same after.
Of course it was Cervantes who'd have it. The rumors were true, and he managed to obtain it before he and his ship sank to the bottom of the sea together with it, and now both him and the feather have returned.

For better or worse, this sword is my fate, Ivy thought, and braced herself with what she expected to be of little use against what was to come.

"Long I have awaited this moment." Cervantes said, and -turning the feather sideways- she gave a small brush to her daughter's sole.

Ivy's eyes popped out, so shocked that she even forgot to shriek. Her soles burned. A deep despair set in as Cervantes started to saw the feather back and forth.
Ivy was furious. No matter how you looked at it, this was cheating. Nobody would be able to stand this! No feather in the world had the right to be THIS tickly!

"I don´t want that...
Damn you...you will pay for this!
Stop it! I don't...want that...
St...Stop! Noooooo!
Get away!
No! I don't...I don't...!
Bastard!
Hahahahahahaha!"
Ivy wailed, screaming at the top of her lungs.

"This is how true despair feels!" Cervantes announced. Ivy, her face red and covered in sweat, was inclined to agree.

"Scream!" Cervantes ordered, and Ivy obeyed.
"Yes... that's right, give up already."

"I swear on my blade...I will destroy you! Damn you...I will tear you apart!" She struggled in vain.

"Is that all? I'm disappointed. Begging for mercy? What's the matter, you want to quit already?"
Ivy nodded frantically - yes, YES, she wanted to end this, she even forgot her mission for a few seconds, she could only think of wanting this to end, but her father showed no intention of giving her a break.

"Regret your decision! Give it up!" Cervantes urged her.

It was only due to her extraordinary willpower that Ivy could hang on for so long, and every moment was sending her to new undiscovered depths of ticklish hell.
If I can stand Sole Edge I can prove myself a truly worthy successor, she thought. But she wasn't sure how long she could bear this, every second, no, every micro second with the Sole Edge felt like it was sapping all of her remaining strength. She just slumped into the chair occassionally "yelp"ing and groaning and suirming, her body too tire to even squirm or give the hearty laugh she was famous for.

"Wallow in despair!
Take this!
Die with regret, you fool!"

She saw in panic that her father placed the second feather between her toes; as if the Sole Edge on her right feet wasn't enough, now the bristles of the first feather were sliding over the skin on her left foot too.

"Almost finished...there's only a few things left." He went on but now occassionally slid his tongue between her toes too "Noo! This is ridiculous!" she managed between shaking her head and squirming like a worm on a hook.

"So there's...no way for me to do this?" she thought. Even if she lasted this long, my father would just tease my poor feet until I squealed. With such odds was there even a point to trying to last until the time-out?

"This is the end. This is the end of my cursed journey." she thought before she screamed out her defeat and at the same time felt herself black out for about five seconds.

"The game is over!" Cervantes announced.
"I had more fun than I thought I would!"
"You did well! I have no further use for you."

Ivy sighed, and slumped back in her chair, but on her lips played a weak smile.

"This fight... was most entertaining."
14532222222112.title: Cervantes route (Ivy gets tickled)

14533222221.title: Bounty Hunter

145332222211.content:
Samus just wonders at how she ended up in her present situation.

The female bounty hunter had been given a job to investigate an old miner base stationed on a remote asteroid some light years off. The asteroid originally contained various rare alloys, ready to be gathered up. As mining stations were set up, the inhabitants saw them as a threat. There were several instances of massacres happening in various stations in the area, making companies choose to abandon the asteroid, and bomb the entire place up. Too many men were lost, and besides, they were a nuisance to get rid of. Since then, the entire expanse of rock has been desolate of life for years.

Which is where the job comes into the story. There have been reports of picking up a signal of sorts from one of the mining stations - Mythios, it was called - and a voice could be heard among the static that made up most of the frequency. Many believe it to be a ghost, while some consider it to be a broken transmission on a loo. Whatever the case, it has even reached the ears of many higher-ups. They posted up the job of investigating the disturbance, but no one accepted it. Either they were spooked from the history behind it or they just don't see it as worth their time.

Samus eventually was the one to accept the job, primarily out of curiosity. The pay was nice, but it was mainly the entire subject that bothered her.

She got to the big, barren rock. Equipped with only her zero suit and trusty pistol - she thought it as just a quick in-n-out mission - she approached the station cautiously. The entire thing was next to demolished, save for a couple of wings that were still functioning. Power was even flowing smoothly.

When she entered the first wing, she got an even bigger surprise; it was entirely well-kept, as if nothing happened. The place was white, with blue circuitry lining the walls and floor. Potted plants appeared every now and then. Chairs and tables were grouped in different sections of the wing. A laboratory, cafeteria, and barracks were present, all furnished and polished, as if brand new.

Of course, while she was taking this all in, and wondering how all this was safe from the destruction that happened years ago, someone had sneaked up behind her and knocked her out.

When Samus came to, she found herself in a tight squeeze, to say the least. Her hands and arms were tied together and under her shapely thighs, forcing her to hug her legs toward her chest. To further secure her arms, cables wrapped above and below her chest, around her upper arms as well, keeping her from squirming her upper body altogether. Her legs were also restrained; her ankles and below her knees were bound together with cables. She even lost her footwear, leaving her bare feet out in the open. They also suffered the same bondage; small, thin pieces of string tied her two big toes together, which was then tied o the ankle tie, effectively halting movement in her lower region. What embarrassed her the most was the fact that her body was stuffed in some form of box, leaving her head and legs visible only. A gel-like substance surrounded the rest of her body that was actually in the box, forming what felt like a cushion to her. Of course, this also prevented movement even more for her. A cleave gag was what kept her from shouting out to whoever did this to her in the first place.

Initially, she began to struggle, but after a minute it proved to be futile. Then she tried to get out of the box by shifting her weight so that it tipped over. Of course, that didn't work, because she didn't see that the box was bolted down to the ground. After that, she just gave up, and this is when she began thinking about how she ended up in this situation in the first place.

When she was done with that, though, a lone figure began to appear before her. She studied the figure as it came closer.

It appeared to be...a boy. Somewhere around his late teens. He was pretty tall, a bit skinny, with slightly dark skin. Black short hair covered his head. Behind his dark goggles, the boy's amber eyes redirected Samus' own gaze back to her. He wore a black flannel shirt with a white undershirt,navy jeans, and black shoes.

When the boy finally came to Samus, her struggling returned anew, and she shouted in her gag. What she was trying to say was Just who are you and why did you do this to me?!

The boy said nothing, but just merely observed his captive. He then smiled. "I see that someone has found herself comfortable."

Mocking me, wait'll I get out of this, wise guy...Samus thought to herself as she continued to stare her young captor down.

Unfazed by her gesture, the boy continued,"I suppose this is where you ask me who am I and why are you in such a position, yes? Well, you need not know my name. Your purpose here, though..."he leaned in closer to her face,"...is to entertain me."

Samus' eyes widened, and began to shout defiantly into her gag. The boy smiled, and straightened herself out.

"You see, I'm not from here" he said, gesturing to his apparel. "I'm from another universe. I have the power to jump through such instances. And I use my power to find pleasure in each instance. You are going to be a lovely addition to my growing collection."

At these words, Samus tried even harder to get out of her current situation. She only succeeded in tiring herself out. Defeated, she looked back up to this stranger.

"Don't worry, you will be taken well care of. All you'll function as for me..."he leaned forward into her ear,"my one and only tickle slave."

Samus glared at the young man. Tickle slave? Really? That's what all this is about? Just who the hell does he think he is?

The man straightened himself again."You don't look too happy. Here, we can fix that..." He walked over to her feet, and sat himself down right in front of them. Samus continued to glare at him, but her was too concentrated on her feet.

Samus' feet were splendid. Despite her occupation, they appear as dainty and well-kept as if she was royalty. Her pale, creamy feet, tucked away in her boots and armor, had no blemish or flaw of any kind. She didn't even paint her toenails, keeping them natural-looking. This only added to the sense of beauty that radiated from these perfect soles. Samus fidgeted a bit as he continued to gaze her feet. She saw in his eyes a look of hunger. Her resolve was shakened but only for a bit.

Without a word, the young man...

Chichibinta Rika awoke to find herself in quite a predicament.
Somehow, she had been transported into an enormous cavern of a planet-killer class asteroid. She was seated with her wrists and forearms imbedded in the cavern ceiling. Her legs were spread apart, and out in front of her. The rocky floor seemed to have grown around her shins, from her ankles to just above her knees, holding her legs immobile.
Moreover, her top and skirt had been removed. She wore nothing but her headdress and her sexy high heeled shoes.
Chichibinta Rika tried to pull out of her bondage, but the rocky restraints held fast and didn't crack one little bit.
There wasn't much that could threaten Chichibinta Rika. She was so gigantic that nothing could harm her. Still, this was the first time in her long life that she had ever been this helpless, and she was curious about who could have performed this act.
"Hello!" someone called out to her.
Chichibinta Rika looked about and saw a tiny creature on the rock holding captive her left leg.
"Who are you?" she asked, "Are you responsible for this?"
"Well, see, my name is Dr. Loonynut. And yes, I'm afraid I am the one who placed you in this little predicament. Yes."
"Release me, creature." Chichibinta Rika demanded, "My anger is great, but I will withhold destroying you if you release me, now."
"Oh, I'm afraid you won't be going anywhere for quite some time, my dear. You see, I have... ehmm... 'intentions' for you."
With that, Dr. Loonynut pulled out a small box from his travel bag and pressed a series of buttons on it.
Two robots trundled out on tank-tread bases. These robots were very large, about as big as Chichibinta Rika's feet; which, by the way, the robots were rolling right up to.
Dr. Loonynut pushed more buttons and the robots began to remove Chichibinta Rika's high heels.
"What are you doing?" Chichibinta Rika asked.
After the robots were done with her sexy high heels, Dr. Loonynut entered more commands into the controller box. Soon two flying robots came in. They sent out lariats of steel cable which latched onto Chichibinta Rika's toes. The flying robots pulled her feet back and pitoned the cables deep in the cavern floor. Chichibinta Rika's feet were now immobile.
"What is this?" She demanded, "Why are you doing this?"
"Tell me, my dear," Dr. Loonynut responded, "Are you, by any chance.... ticklish"
Chichibinta Rika had to call on all her will power to not show any fear. She was indeed ticklish. Very, VEEEEEERY ticklish! No one ever dared tickle her before, but this little creature was threatening to do just that. She couldn't help but squirm uncomfortably against her restraints. But they held firm.
"Now then." Dr. Loonynut wondered out loud, "Where, Oh, where on your sexy ticklish body should I start?"

So, Dr. Loonynut pressed in another command and the large tank-treaded robots began to approach Chichibinta Rika's feet again. But this time, their chests opened and several arms extended forth, each ending in twirling brushes.
